long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reflect Webchat is a free Chrome extension that provides an AI-powered chat interface for web pages. 

- Chat with blog posts or YouTube videos
- Pulls the page into context
- Use your own OpenAI or Anthropic account
- Supports YouTube transcripts
- MIT licensed

Please note:
- You will need to enter your own Anthropic or OpenAI API keys for this extension to work. 
- This extension is designed to work with long form articles like blog posts or YouTube videos. It will not work with Google Sheets, for example.
- This extension is built for Chrome and will not work in other browsers (such as Arc). 

Requests are made directly to the respective APIs and we don't log anything. Your keys are secured and saved locally. All the code is open-source here: https://github.com/team-reflect/webchat

Built by the team at Reflect.
